# NFTCollection.getMintTransaction() method

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
>
> Use `contract.mint.prepare(...args)` instead

Construct a mint transaction without executing it. This is useful for estimating the gas cost of a mint transaction, overriding transaction options and having fine grained control over the transaction execution.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getMintTransaction(receiver: AddressOrEns, metadata: NFTMetadataOrUri): Promise<Transaction>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                          | Description                              |
| --------- | --------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| receiver  | [AddressOrEns](./sdk.addressorens.md)         | Address you want to send the token to    |
| metadata  | [NFTMetadataOrUri](./sdk.nftmetadataoruri.md) | The metadata of the NFT you want to mint |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Transaction](./sdk.transaction.md)&gt;
